## Tabs.adjust() method

The adjust method for FASTTabs

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adjust(adjustment: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  adjustment | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

This method allows the active index to be adjusted by numerical increments
